example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (NP-SBJ (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON الذين)) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يرون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC خلاف) (NP (DEM_PRON_MS ذلك)))))) (NP (PRON_3MP هم))) (PP-PRD (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN فئة) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (DET+NOUN.VN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN القائلين) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الفتاة)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM حامل) (NP-ADV (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC قليلاً)) (ADVP (ADV فقط))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: that the girl is only a little pregnant
